meanings.definition: Opposed to or rejecting conventional practices or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: She always takes an anticonventional approach to problem-solving.
meanings.sent2: The artist's anticonventional style stood out in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: His anticonventional fashion sense raised eyebrows at the formal event.
meanings.sent4: The anticonventional thinker paved a new path in the field of science.
meanings.sent5: The anticonventional design of the building was both innovative and daring.

meanings.definition: Not following traditional or usual methods or standards.
meanings.sent1: Their anticonventional marketing strategy attracted a younger audience.
meanings.sent2: The anticonventional approach to cooking led to delicious and unique dishes.
meanings.sent3: The anticonventional road trip took them through unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: Her anticonventional teaching methods inspired creativity in her students.
meanings.sent5: The anticonventional solution to the problem surprised everyone with its effectiveness.
